comments.comments_text: Marko Marin (Crvena zvezda) overhits the corner kick and none of his teammates can their head on it.

comments.comments_text: Michel Aebischer (Young Boys) swings in a dangerous cross from the resulting corner kick, but none of his teammates manage to outjump the defence.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) swings in a dangerous cross from the resulting corner kick, but none of his teammates manage to outjump the defence.

comments.comments_text: A superb goal from great team play! Roger Assale (Young Boys) latches on to a perfect pass and fires an excellent low shot inside the right post. There is nothing a goalkeeper can do about shots like that.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A superb goal from great team play! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) latches on to a perfect pass and fires an excellent low shot inside the right post. There is nothing a goalkeeper can do about shots like that.

comments.comments_text: It's in the back of the net! Marko Gobeljic plays it into the box, and Mateo Ezequiel Garcia (Crvena zvezda) gets on the end of the cross to put it into the bottom left corner. 1:2.

comments.comments_text: Today's referee Danny Makkelie rightly decides to book Vincent Sierro (Young Boys) for his harsh tackle.
